ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, you can sell that way.  Just don t Hail them or they ll turn around.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, you can sell that way. Just don't Hail them or they'll turn around.

On Fri, Apr 28, 2000 at 07:32:22AM -0500, Currey, Mick wrote:
> I've read on this list before that you can sell to merchants that are
> normally KOS if you sneak up behind them and sell while sneaking. Can
> anyone verify this? I've used sneak many times to go past things that were
> KOS, so I know that part works. I've even bumped into KOS mobs while
> sneaking and not been attacked.
>
> BTW, I love my new Iksar monk!
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Thom Green [mailto:thom_mg@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 5:12 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
>
> The negitive is that they are hated by every other race in
> the world. Try
> going to Unrest at 20th or so to collect some of that FS or
> bronze and hoard
> it up till you are twice over your weight limit as an Iksar,
> then, try to
> find a merchant to sell it too who wont kill you on sight.
>
> Shelza, Karana
> Berfurt, Karana
>
>
> >From: "Bennett, Brian" <brian.bennett@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
> >To: "'EQ-Monks@egroups.com'" <EQ-Monks@egroups.com>
> >Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
> >Date: Thu, 27 Apr 2000 17:49:20 -0400
> >
> >Ok I promise this won't become the whineplay forum...
> >
> >Can someone point out a negative of the iksar? All I see
> so far is the 20%
> >exp penatly. And they're butt ugly :)
> >
> >
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: John Carney [mailto:jcarney@...]
> >Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 5:16 PM
> >To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
> >Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
> >
> >
> >Because the BASE is 100, not 0.
> >
> >100 + (Level * 5) = 120 at level 4.
> >
> >If the skill maxes out at 200, then at level 20 Iksar will
> stop getting
> >swimming increases: 100 + (20 * 5) = 200.
> >
> >see?
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: ug@... [mailto:ug@...]
> >Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 4:56 PM
> >To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
> >Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
> >
> >
> >Dizzy J. writes:
> >
> > > most likely when you get to lvl 24 your swimming skill
> will start to
> > > increase again.
> >
> >I understand what you're getting at here, but this makes me
> wonder why
> >it would increase from 100 to 120 in the first place.
> >
> >
>
